---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea for Amazon FreeRTOS
labels: feature request

---
## Visit the FreeRTOS Community Support Forums
If you have an issue that does not fit the bug or feature request issue types, please post in the [FreeRTOS Community Support Forums](https://forums.freertos.org/). The FreeRTOS Community Forums is the epicenter for the community of FreeRTOS developers to connect and receive support from peers, AWS engineers, and FreeRTOS partners.

Thank you!
